00028 class ImageTransform{
00029 
00030 
00031  private:
00032 
00033   // Resolution independent x,y,w,h viewport
00034   float view_left, view_top, view_width, view_height;
00035 
00036   int resolution;                             // Requested resolution
00037   unsigned int max_resolutions;               // Total available resolutions
00038   unsigned int left, top, width, height;      // Requested width and height
00039   unsigned int min_size;                      // Minimum viewport dimension
00040   unsigned int max_size;                      // Maximum viewport dimension
00041   unsigned int requested_width;               // Width requested by WID command
00042   unsigned int requested_height;              // Height requested by HEI command
00043   float contrast;                             // Contrast adjustment requested by CNT command
00044 
00045 
00048 
00051   void calculateResolution( unsigned int m, unsigned int r );

00054  public:
00055 
00057   ImageTransform() {
00058     resolution = 0; max_resolutions = 0; min_size = 8; max_size = 0;
00059     width = 0; height = 0;
00060     view_left = 0.0; view_top = 0.0; view_width = 1.0; view_height = 1.0;
00061     requested_width = 0; requested_height = 0;
00062     contrast = 1.0;
00063   };
00064

00067
